name: Chambers of Fortune
description:
Created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

IF THE EXECUTABLE DOES NOT RUN, DELETE "Chambers Of Fortune.deps.JSON". 

If prompted, please download .NET Core Runtime here. 

Mouse and keyboard required.

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click to shoot/use selected item

Right click or E to pickup gun/item

Scroll wheel or Q to switch inventory slots

You have entered the Chambers of Fortune. Defeat enemies, acquire new weapons, and traverse through floors to discover what lies within. 

The behavior of weapons in this game is decided by dice rolls—higher rolls grant different effects per gun. The probability of rolling higher or lower is decided by zones of luck. Green areas increase the chance of rolling higher numbers, while red areas increase the chance of rolling lower numbers. However, green zones are not always better for you—they increase the power of enemies' bullets as well. Try different guns and discover their properties when affected by higher or lower probabilities!
